GSD.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v5.4.208
GSD.description:
ip: Fix a data-race around sysctl_fwmark_reflect.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.208 by commit 25a635a67c830766110410fea88ec4e6ee29684b, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit e110861f86094cd78cc85593b873970092deb43a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ip: Fix a data-race around sysctl_fwmark_reflect.
